activities: Information submitted through our website will be used for and handled according to our privacy policy posted on our website.   In addition, our core business is implementing and maintaining enterprise HR, financial (and other) systems as well as business intelligence services.  We may come in contact with personal information from EU/EEA and/or Switzerland as a result of our clients who may have personal information for their employees, customers, vendors or other individuals located in those regions.  Our access and usage of personal information is limited to support of client systems.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer inquiry data submitted via our website and client data within systems we have been contracted to implement or maintain.
